item.title: Alzheimer’s Association International Conference (AAIC) 2020
item.description: AUTHORS: R Sala-Llonch, J. Contador, A Pérez-Millan, N. Falgàs, M. Ruiz-Peris, R. A. Tort-Merino, M.Balasa, J. Olives, M. Castellví, J. Juncà, S. Borrego-Écija, B. Bosch, G. Fernández, O. Ramos-Campoy, A. Antonell, Sánchez-Valle and A. Lladó. TITLE: Functional network alterations in early-onset Alzheimer’s Disease studied with resting-state fMRI. CONFERENCE: Alzheimer’s Association International Conference (AAIC) 2020 PLACE: Virtual Event DATES: July 27-31, 2020
